data.name: MIGHT'N MOW'EM Demo
data.detailed_description:
Solo or with friends, you'll experience epic battles against hordes of different monsters in the rogue-lite MIGHT'N MOW'EM. Choose your character class, find powerful equipment and unlock permanent upgrades to mow down even more enemies every time.



The RPG Class System
MIGHT'N MOW'EM offers a selection of different character classes, each with specific strengths and weaknesses. Whether tank, damage dealer or support - in the group interplay, the role-playing classes complement each other and enable you to always try out new strategies in combat and use synergies cleverly.



Items and upgrades
In each game run, you'll randomly loot new equipment that will directly affect your game experience and the abilities of your class. Besides, you'll collect valuable resources that you can use to unlock permanent improvements and thus permanently upgrade your character.



Territories and monsters
From rich green forests to icy steppes to seething lava flows, your adventures will take you to different areas to bravely face the dangers that lurk within. Arm yourself and gather your companions to face the horrors that await you together.



What awaits you in MIGHT'N MOW'EM
- Indie Rogue-lite Bullethell RPG
- Single and multiplayer
- Easy to learn, hard to master
- High replay value due to numerous upgrades

data.short_description: Mow thousands of enemies with an ever-growing arsenal of weapons and magic. Upgrade your RPG character class in a rogue-lite manner, find epic loot, and unlock mighty perks to cause even more mayhem in the next run â€“ solo or in multiplayer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960, Radeon RX 570 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Graphics: GeForce 960, Radeon RX 570 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
